text: The men's coxless pair competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-eleven finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Olympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 10:31 || Heats |- | Monday 26 August 2019 || 12:07 || Repechages |- | Wednesday 28 August 2019 || 11:13 || Quarterfinals |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 17:35 || Final E |- | rowspan=2|Friday 30 August 2019 || 09:25 || Semifinals C/D |- | 11:20 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=4|Saturday 31 August 2019 || 09:38 || Final D |- | 09:58 || Final C |- | 11:12 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:37 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The four fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the quarterfinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Martin Sinković ===Semifinals C/D=== The three fastest boats in each semi were sent to the C final.
